title: A fungus usually found on skin might play a role in Crohn's disease

title_detail.value: A fungus usually found on skin might play a role in Crohn's disease

summary: A fungus commonly found in human hair follicles also resides in the gut, where it may worsen intestinal disorders such as inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) in patients with a certain genetic makeup, researchers report.

summary_detail.value: A fungus commonly found in human hair follicles also resides in the gut, where it may worsen intestinal disorders such as inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) in patients with a certain genetic makeup, researchers report.
